mapper.sql: orgid, vspid, name, code, status, orgtype, videoflag, imageflag, textflag, liveflag, widgetflag, description, createtime, createstaffid, expireflag, expiretime, maxdevices, maxstorage, uploadflag, currentdevices, currentstorage, currentdeviceidx, copyright, backupmediaid
mapper.select:
select
from org where status=1 order by orgid desc
select * from org where status='1' and name = #{name}
select * from org where status='1' and code = #{code}
mapper.delete: update org set status='9' where orgid in (#{ids})
mapper.update: update org o, (select count(1) as value, orgid from device where status='1' group by orgid) r set o.currentdevices=r.value where o.orgid=r.orgid and o.status=1
update org o, (select floor(coalesce(sum(size),0)/1048576) as value, orgid from media where status='1' group by orgid) r set o.currentstorage=r.value where o.orgid=r.orgid and o.status=1
mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() as orgid
insert into org (vspid, name, code, status, orgtype, videoflag, imageflag, textflag, liveflag, widgetflag, description, createtime, createstaffid, expireflag, expiretime, maxdevices, maxstorage, uploadflag, currentdevices, currentstorage, currentdeviceidx, copyright, backupmediaid) values (#{vspid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{orgtype,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{videoflag,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{imageflag,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{textflag,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{liveflag,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{widgetflag,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createstaffid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{expireflag,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{expiretime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{maxdevices,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{maxstorage,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{uploadflag,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{currentdevices,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{currentstorage,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{currentdeviceidx,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{copyright,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{backupmediaid,jdbcType=INTEGER})
